message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you, so I think this is a fair price.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $8,800. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,800 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,200.  This is still a great deal for you, given the value of the product. Let's meet in the middle!
I understand your position, Alice. While I'm not comfortable at $9,200, I'd like to make a final offer of $9,000. I believe this reflects a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
